* Margins may be reduced on a train by train basis with agreement from GB Railfreight.
Planning Restriction

Any TOC/FOC/Charter Company that wish to use Eastleigh East Yard or Eastleigh Marshalling Yard, whetherstabling or for operational purposes, must gain permission and agreement with the Lease Holder (currently GBRailfreight). Eastleigh East Yard and Marshalling Yard are not Network. GB Railfreight currently manage the Yardon behalf and under contract with Network Rail Route Services.

Down services crossing over to stop or entering the loop to stop, and up services entering Platform 1 do notrequire the standard {1⁄2} as it is already included in the SRT’s.
